name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol is a common pain reliever and a fever reducer. It is used to treat many conditions such as headache, muscle aches, arthritis, backache, toothaches, colds, and fevers.

name: Cough Syrup
description: Cough syrup is a medication used to treat coughing and related conditions. It contains cough suppressants, expectorants, antihistamines, decongestants, and/or mucolytics.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Antibiotic capsules are medications that destroy or slow down the growth of bacteria. They are used to treat bacterial infections in various parts of the body.

name: Durolane
description: Pain relief injections are used to provide fast relief from severe pain. They contain pain-relieving medications such as opioids, corticosteroids, or local anesthetics.

name: Antacid Tablet
description: Antacid tablets are medications used to neutralize stomach acid and relieve symptoms of acid reflux, heartburn, indigestion, and upset stomach.

name: Vitamin Syrup
description: Vitamin syrup is a liquid supplement containing essential vitamins and minerals. It is used to maintain overall health and prevent vitamin deficiencies.

name: Antifungal Cream
description: Antifungal cream is a medication used to treat fungal infections of the skin. It contains antifungal agents that kill or prevent the growth of fungi.

name: Allergy Nasal Spray
description: Allergy nasal spray is a medication used to relieve symptoms of allergic rhinitis such as sneezing, itching, and congestion. It contains corticosteroids or antihistamines.

name: Antiseptic Solution
description: Antiseptic solution is a liquid used to clean wounds, cuts, and scrapes. It kills bacteria and prevents infection.

name: Antihistamine Tablet
description: Antihistamine tablets are medications used to relieve symptoms of allergies such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose. They block the action of histamine, a substance produced by the body during allergic reactions.

name: Iron Supplement
description: Iron supplements are used to prevent or treat iron deficiency anemia. They increase the level of iron in the body and help produce red blood cells.

name: Antacid Chewable Tablet
description: Antacid chewable tablets are medications used to neutralize stomach acid and provide relief from heartburn, indigestion, and upset stomach. They come in chewable form for easy consumption.

name: Dwttol Antibacterial Soap
description: Antibacterial soap is a cleansing agent that contains antibacterial ingredients. It kills bacteria on the skin and helps prevent infections.
